cast.name: 菲利普·布莱德尼 Filipp Blednyy

director.name: 亚历山大·阿拉文 Aleksandr Aravin

introduction: In the first months of the war 3 young people - Rita, Ivan and Yasha - are involved in a horrible crime story: Rita's parents brutally murdered, Yasha became an unwitting accomplice to murder, and Vanya - accidental eyewitness. All three get into a reconnaissance, which are prepared to throw in the German rear, advancing on the capital. There, against the backdrop of the war, they will find out the truth about yourself and solve the mystery of the death of the parents of Rita.
